posts.post_content:
I've been able to upgrade some of my cards recently, so looking to sell the following T206 in good condition (well, the King isn't in good condition, but it's an SL) for $15 each delivered.  Take the lot of 6 for $85.  For the first day of the listing, I'll give priority to those requesting the greatest number of cards.  I will be listing some T206 in poor and fair condition as well.  Send me a PM or an email: [url]ericksummers@yahoo.com[/url]

Bush, Donie
Gibson, George - corner crease not obvious in scan
King, Frank - Southern League, trim
Purtell, Billy - corner crease not obvious in scan
Quillen, Lee
Smith, Heinie

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100021/goodF/web.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100021/goodB/web.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take the Purtell, Gibson and Bush. Let me know.
Did I get three I asked about or did someone beat ms to it?

Sorry, someone else took all six.
